title: must fail to import definition file
specs: contains two events for a caseType with userRole caseworker-caa
provides a clear validation message describing why the definition import has failed, for example, UserRole 'caseworker-caa' is defined more than once for case type 'CaseTypeID' in worksheet [TabName]

body.__plainTextValue__: Validation errors occurred importing the spreadsheet.- UserRole 'caseworker-caa' is defined more than once for case type 'FT_MasterCaseType' in worksheet 'AuthorisationCaseEvent'
